title: Get a tax disc (vehicle licence) using form V10

details.description: Get a tax disc (vehicle licence) using form V10
details.body:
If you want to renew your tax disc (vehicle licence) but don’t have your V11 reminder you can download a V10 form and apply at some post offices, a DVLA local office or by post.

Download ‘V10 Application for a tax disc’ (PDF, 215KB)

The form includes guidance notes and where to send it.

You can also use the form if:

  • any vehicle details (for example, tax class) have changed
  • there has been a break in taxing the vehicle
  • your vehicle is declared off road by a SORN (Statutory Off Road Notification) and you now want to tax it

You need a V5C vehicle registration certificate (log book) to use this form. If you don’t have one, you can apply for one.

If you have your V11 reminder, you can apply for your tax disc online.

For heavy goods vehicles (HGVs) you’ll need to apply for vehicle tax using a V85 form.

details.description: Getting and exchanging tax discs, tax rates and SORN

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
Find out which vehicles are exempt from vehicle tax (car tax) and how you may still need to display a tax disc

related.title: Apply for a tax disc refund (form V14)

details.description: Fill in form V14 and send to DVLA to apply for a vehicle tax disc refund

related.title: Apply for a duplicate tax disc

details.description: Use form V20 to apply for a duplicate vehicle tax disc

related.title: Applying for a HGV vehicle licence (tax disc) - form V85

details.description: To apply for an HGV vehicle licence (tax disc) download and fill in form V85 and apply in person at a DVLA local office
Apply at DVLA local offices or fill in form V70 ‘Application to exchange a vehicle tax disc’ and send it to a DVLA local office with any payment and extra documents
Tables showing the rates for a tax disc (vehicle tax) for different types of vehicles
Use the online tool to find the tax rate for all vehicle types
